chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 has the above problem:
As I tried to set up my SIM card for the device for the first time, it didn't recognize the SIM card and couldn't establish a connection to a mobile network. My SIM card works flawlessly in other iPhone devices.

Thank you very much for your help,

Hello Gabriele, You'll find your return label attached to this message. Chronopost will handle your return. Simply drop off your package at a nearby drop-off location. A list of locations can be found here: Before you prepare your return: 1. Here are instructions on how to return an item: https://help.backmarket.com/hc/en-us/articles/360014698640-Returns-and-refunds-instructions 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product. 3. Remove any existing protective covering or film. 4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below: How to package your product: • The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product lying flat so it won't move during transit. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare label inside for identification in case the original one is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from both inside and outside before sending. This will protect you in case your product gets damaged during transit. Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll let you know as soon as it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Please inform the customer that there could be 2 possibilities in this situation. an issue arising from the device or an issue with an old sim card. Reusing the old sim card is not recommended usually as the gold contacts on the sim card could potentially be worn off due to wear and tear and long term use.

We recommend the customer to restart the device to see if the issue persist. If it still persists, the customer may try to reinsert the sim card.

All devices has been tested before we send it out. I’ve just checked the record and the device was able to receive calls during the pre-delivery check before the product was dispatched to the customer. 

Thank you. 

Regards,
KJ

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
